thread.title: Passengers react angrily to train strike disruption
thread.title_full: Passengers react angrily to train strike disruption | Meridian - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Passengers react angrily to train strike disruption
text:
Kirsty @coolandme Follow @ fgw Have you decided how you will be compensating season ticket holders for the strike? I'll be out of pocket just to get to work....
18:11 - 8 Jul 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite Ella @missellaferris Follow First Great Western I blame you for the damage that will be done to my legs when I have to cycle everywhere for the next 48 hours
18:15 - 8 Jul 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite Jack S @Steaders123 Follow These next two days are going to be horrendous with both First Great Western strikes and Tube strikes
17:33 - 8 Jul 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite Maureen McAllister @McAllisterandCo Follow @ fgw any inconvenience? As a small businesses owner I've had to pay hotel bills because of the strike - more than an inconvenience!
18:12 - 8 Jul 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite You can find out how the industrial action may affect your travel plans here .
Last updated Wed 8 Jul 2015 Read more 4 updates Commuter chaos as train and tube strikes begin Travel Berkshire Dorset Surrey Oxfordshire Hampshire & Isle of Wight
